post:
Hello,

I am selling my server colocated in Dacentec datacenter in Lenoire if anyone interested. I purchased it 2014-06-24 and it has been been working very well since then.

The server specs are as follows right from the invoice:

1 x Supermicro SuperServer SYS-6027R-TRF Dual LGA2011 740W 2U Rackmount Server Barebone System (Black)	SY-627RTRF

1 x Intel Xeon E5-2670 Eight-Core Processor 2.6GHz 8.0GT/s 20MB LGA 2011 CPU, OEM	E5_2670	 	 

4 x Kingston ValueRAM KVR16R11D4/16 DDR3-1600 16GB/2Gx72 ECC/REG CL11 Server Memory	W16GER160K	 
	 
4 x Seagate Constellation ES.3 ST2000NM0033 2TB 7200RPM SATA3/SATA 6.0 GB/s 128MB Enterprise Hard Drive	HD-ST20NM3		 	 


Have a great day.
